English:
Slavery is allowed for all slaves, even those that share our faith.
§RThis reform affects POP promotion chance - promotion will be slower, both globally and even more in slave states.§!
§YPops in Slave states will be more conservative and less liberal. Immigrants are less likely to choose slave states.§!
§GThe slave population will grow.§!

Only the first class citizens of the country are allowed to participate in the political life, all the other groups are segregated. Becoming a first class citizen is hard and extremely limited.
§YExtends Coring Events To §GPrimary Culture Provinces§Y Only.§!

§RCoring Events Are Enabled Through §YThe Very Influential Beurocracy§R Reform!§!

Persons from the country's culture are allowed to participate in the political life of the country and citizenship is greatly facilitated for these people.
§YExtends Coring Events To §GPrimary Culture and Accepted Culture Provinces§Y Only.§!

§RCoring Events Are Enabled Through §YThe Very Influential Beurocracy§R Reform!§!

All legal immigrants, regardless of the culture, are allowed to vote. Acquiring citizenship status is facilitated.
§YExtends Coring Events To §GPrimary Culture, Accepted Culture And Core-Neighbouring Provinces§Y Only.§!

§RCoring Events Are Enabled Through §YThe Very Influential Beurocracy§R Reform!§!
The League for Universal Political Rights

Serfs are bound to the land and subject to the will of its owner and forced to work the fields under a feudal system.\n§RThis reform affects POP promotion chance - promotion will be slower.§!\n§RThis reform causes farmers to be less likely to migrate.§!

Corvée is a form of unpaid forced labour that is intermittent in nature, lasting for limited periods of time, typically only a certain number of days' work each year. Statute labour is a corvée imposed by a state for the purposes of public works..
Campaign for the Abolition of Serfdom
The Church controls enjoys significant privileges within the state, and the clergy are greatly relied on for secular administration.\n§YSlightly §GIncreases §YPOP Conversion Chance§!
The Church holds a favorable association with the state, and are given significant power and privileges in regards to administration.\n§YMarginally §GIncreases §YPOP Conversion Chance§!
The Church is moderately relied on, and is given some power and privileges in regards to administration.
The power of the Church in administration of the state is greatly reduced, and some ecclesiastic privileges have been revoked.
Administration of the state is divorced from the influence of the Church, and the clergy are delegated only to religious roles. The Kings hold the right to elect their own bishopry.
Dominative Nobility.\n§YNoticably §RDiscourages§! §YCraftsmen Promotion§!\n§YCan Mobilize Nobility If Monarchy§!
Influential Nobility.\n§YSlightly §RDiscourages§! §YCraftsmen Promotion§!\n§YCan Mobilize Nobility If Monarchy§!
Marginally Influential Nobility.\n§YDoes NOT impact Craftsmen Promotion§!\n§YCan Mobilize Nobility If Monarchy§!
A mix of poor quality levies and men-at-arms provided by nobility in service of the King.\n§YCan Perform §GArmy Works§!
Nomadic tribes are demanded to provide a levy of cavalrymen in service of the Khan.\n§YMarginally §GIncreases §YSoldier Promotion§!
The nobility are given more leeway in providing levies, in exchange for providing more men-at-arms.\n§YSlightly §GIncreases §YSoldier Promotion§!
Mercenaries companies compose the bulk of our armies, and .\n§YNoticably §GIncreases §YSoldier Promotion§!
Army composed of mix of professional soldiers and higher quality levies.\n§YHighly §GIncreases §YSoldier Promotion\nCan Recruit Up To §G6%§Y Soldier POPs§!
Decentralized state with a lacking central power and various autonomous states.
Influential Bureaucracy.\n§YEnables §GCoring Events§Y IF our §GParliament§Y is an §GAdministrative Parliament§!

English: The Court is full of most influential and best Philosphers from our country to help us guide the nation.
Subjects are dominated by our Head of State
All Executive Powers belong to our highest official.\n§YIncreases §PAbsolutist§Y Ideology in Pops§!\n§YThis reform reduces your Change Estate Influence Decision §RCooldown§Y to §G15§Y years§!

The Executive Power is in the hands of our highest official, but he is supported by a dedicated Privy Council in some of his duties.\n§YCan Appoint And Dissmiss Lead Ministers.§!\n§YThis reform reduces your Change Estate Influence Decision §RCooldown§Y to §G10§Y years.§!

The Highest Official of the state apppoints a mandated council which holds considerable executive powers.\n§YCan Appoint And Dissmiss Lead Ministers.§!\n§YThis reform reduces your Change Estate Influence Decision §RCooldown§Y to §G7.5§Y years.§!
The Rich Class and Prominent Families can use existing laws to justify taking over government positions over competent individuals

A handfull of most influential families are in controll of our most important government positions.\n§YTo take this Reform you must lower your Noble Influence Beyond Slightly Influential and Church Influence beyond Very Influential. Monarchies require getting the Rights and Liberty tech first.§W\n

Individuals are given government positions based on their accomplishments, not titles.\n§YTo take this Reform you must lower your Noble Influence Beyond Slightly Influential, Church Influence beyond Very Influential and increase Beaurocratic Influence above Slightly Influential.  Monarchies require getting the Law and Jurisprudence tech first.§W\n
Our parliament serves our Leader in managing the administrative part of our country.\n§YAllows using the Bureaucrat Promotion National Focus in states with non-accepted pops.§!

The Public Maintenance spending budget goes towards helping out your pops gain more money.  The amount of money to distribute depends on your §Ycountry administrative efficiency§!.\n§YPublic Maintenance Cost is essentialy reskinned pensions.§Y
§YCan Take The "Based On Skill and Merit" Career Progress Reform§!
Militarist\n§WIncreases Jingoism Popularity§!\n§WSligthly Increases Soldier Promotion§!

§WIncreases Aristocrat Promotion (If Monarchy)

Slightly Increases Craftsmen Promotion§!

§WDecreases Rebel Spawn chance
Increases Aristocrat Promotion
Increases §YNobility§! Support in Pops§!
Clergyman\n§WMajorly Decreases Rebel Spawn Chance§!\n§WMajorly Increases Pop Conversion Chance§!
Our Newly Appointed Leading Advisor will be a §Y$NATIONALVALUE$§!.\n
Our Head Of State is accountable to the Parliment, but still retains influence on our politics
Executive head is assigned absolute control over legislative process
There is no limit to the taxation fee associated with enfeoffment.
The taxation fee associated with enfeoffment is extortionate, but based on acceptable limits.
The taxation fee associated with enfeoffment is regulated, and nobles pay an acceptable set rate.
It has become increasingly clear that we cannot rule alone, we should set up a proper advisor council to help us manage state affairs.\n§RThis decision will get rid of the §PAbsolutism reform!§!
Slavery is restricted to only slaves that do not share our faith or our skin.
This Faction is comprised of the following estates
This faction is comprised of people loyal to the sovereign and will prevent any faction from being very influential besides bureaucracy.
This faction is comprised of Nobles and Church Officials and will work towards increasing the influence of those factions.
This faction is comprised of Nobles and Gentry and will work towards increasing the influence of those factions.
This faction is comprised of Gentry and Burghers and will work towards increasing the influence of those factions.
This faction is comprised of the Nobility and will work towards increasing the influence of their faction.
This faction is comprised of the Gentry will work towards increasing the influence of their faction.
This faction is comprised of Church Officials and will work towards increasing the influence of their faction.
The Pope is the highest representative of God, and his word is of higher authority than even our own King.
Secular authority is superior to the spiritual authority of the Church.\n§YThe Church estate will be §Rdisabled§Y.§!

Religious minorities in our countries are activly converted to the majority religion.\n§YDepending on our religious policy, religious minorities may be §Rpersecuted§Y.\n§RDepending on our religious policy religious minorities will NOT assimilate or recieve a major debuff to assimilation§!

Freedom of worship is present however the disidents may not occupy political stations.\n§RDepending on our religious policy, religious minorities, that belong to either the §YRich Strata§R or§Y Middle Strata §Rwill NOT assimilate or recieve a major debuff to assimilation§!
Freedom of worship is present and disdents may occupy political stations.\n§YReligious minorities will not recieve an assimilation debuff§!

French: S?ectionnez ?$PARTY$? comme parti dirigeant de notre pays.\n

English: We cannot select $PARTY$ as our ruling Estate because:\n
French: Nous ne pouvons pas s?ectionner $PARTY$ comme parti dirigeant car :\n
German: Wir k?nen $PARTY$ nicht als unsere Regierungspartei ausw?len, weil:\n
Spanish: No podemos elegir como partido gobernante a $PARTY$ por la siguiente raz?:\n

English: Hold election to appoint a new ruling Estate.\n
French: Organiser des ?ections pour d?igner un nouveau parti dirigeant.\n
German: Wahl abhalten, um neue Regierungspartei zu ernennen.\n
Spanish: Celebrar elecciones para elegir un nuevo partido gobernante.\n

English: An election is under way. A new ruling Estate will elected $DATE$.\n
French: Des ?ections sont en cours. Un nouveau parti dirigeant sera ?u le $DATE$.\n
German: Eine Wahl ist im Gange. Eine neue Regierungspartei wird gew?lt $DATE$.\n
Spanish: Estamos en campa? electoral. Se elegir?un nuevo partido gobernante el $DATE$.\n

English: $NAME$ will become the new ruling Estate.\n
French: $NAME$ va devenir le nouveau parti dirigeant.\n

English: $PERCENT$% of our empowered strata are loyal to the $IDEOLOGY$\n
$PERCENT$% of our population are loyal to the $IDEOLOGY$\n
Sort list by how important it is to our population
Sort list by how important it is to empowered strata
($PERCENT$% of the Upper House in favor of reforms)
There are no official restricting the rights of the peasantry to bear arms.
Laws are passed through oral tradition and can only be interpeted by tribal leader.
Education centers are informal and scarce.
The highest education is provided through monastic schools.
The highest education is provided through religious universities.
The highest education is provided through secular universities.
The nobility are the primary castellans, and use their castles as their powerbase.
Castellans are appointed by and wholly subordinate to the King.
Castles are administered by religious military orders that secure our borders and spread the faith.
Tenants can lease out their land to other tenants.
Tenants can no longer subinfeud land, and own it but pay a portion of its proceeds to the state.
Property is fully divorced from the head of state, and fully belongs to its owners.
Knights are required to serve in military campaigns for a set amount of days, in exchange for land.
Knights can pay a special tax in lieu of service.
Rather than paying a special tax, knights pay a lump-sum in lieu of service. A simplified system that disentangles itself from the devolvement of fuedalism.
Nobility are absolved of paying taxes.
Nobility pay a limited form of taxes.
Nobility have to contribute normally to taxes.
Guilds are heavily monopolized, and control major aspects of the economes of towns, such as labor, production, and trade.
Guilds are inluential in the city's economy, but do not have the total power to dictate labor and trade freely.
Guilds do not control major aspects of the city economy, and free competition is enjoyed without intervention from the guilds.
The Absolutist seeks to return executive power to the king. The monarch shall reign supreme blessed by God!
The Royalist seeks to return executive power to the king. The monarch shall reign supreme blessed by God!
Rebels raised by nobles disgruntled at their lack of power in the nation, they will seek to forcefully enact reforms that grant them more of it.
Whether spread through foreign intrigue or popular support, a pretender has risen in the nation, aiming to supplant the righteous throne.
The peasantry, in tandem with the rural elites, have risen up to gain more power under the feudal system.
The revolutionary peasantry seek to usurp both the nobility and the king, establishing a new social order conforming to the peasantry.
Insurrectionists that carry the support of urban leaders and rural factions, they seek to establish their own powerbase within the feudal system.
Insurrectionists that carry the support of urban leaders and rural factions, they seek freedom from excessive taxation and harsh policies.
Religous zealots enraged with the spread of heresy and weakening of the Church, they attempt to restore God's grace to the nation.
Heretics oppressed for their faith, they seek freedom from religious discrimination.

Crown Legitimacy represents the level of political control and respect the executive commands, affecting the nation's overall efficiency and potential for unrest or revolt. Losing wars or upsetting the nobility will lower legitimacy.
